Posts.Content: Hello Dee. Just read your post and very interested and wonder would you mind telling me when they feel something under the arm and are going to do a biopsy could it be other than cancer? I was called back this week and had a second Mammo. and Ultra. but they would not do the Biopsys two somethings in breast and something under the arm pit same breast because I have a pacemaker and on blood thinners so having it doen tomorrow Friday and VERY lucky to get in before Christmas when they close for a couple of weeks. I have been on Hormone Replacement for nearly 27 years (yes I know I know) but my quality of life would be terrible without it but maybe now I may not have a life I do hope so though Thanks for reading. Locket.
Posts.Title: Mammograms

Posts.Content: I have been through the call back mammogram and the ultra sounds and the core biopsys. I have breast cancer but not palpable so early stage. Humungous shock to my husband and I. Having the hook wire procedure 17th Jan. and then the op. to get the rotten thing. .. I know very little about the hook wire procedure so would be very grateful to have anyone explain it to me and the procedures and all I can expect.. Many thanks Locket
Posts.Title: Hookwire Procedure and the operation same day
